name: Yummy Pizza Cupcakes
author: Rebecca Van
summary: All the yummy things in pizza rolled in with a biscuit to make one tasty little pizza cupcake.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners and spray with cooking spray
Pour pizza sauce into a large bowl
Cut each biscuit into 10 to 15 small pieces and stir into the pizza sauce
Add mozzarella, pepperoni, mushrooms, olives, and Italian seasoning and mix to combine well
Spoon the pizza mixture equally into the prepared muffin tin
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and cheese has melted, 25 to 30 minutes
Remove from the oven; let cool for 5 minutes before removing muffins from the tin
